Name: -jtë
Comment: n>vt, ‘provide P with N’ or ‘make P characterized by N’

Name: -topo
Comment: Contained in [mp](tojpepurp). Marginally occurs in predicative uses (histyarirdi-0542, histyarirdi-0091); can combine with [mp](neinf).

Name: -jra
Comment: Is this really a privative? Or a cessative? [ex](anfoperso-08).

Name: t-
Comment: Fossilized, but still looks like a morpheme.
